summary: Adds Waterwalking as a common spell.
descriptionHtml:
One of the most sought-after magical effects in TES III: Morrowind and TES IV: Oblivion was the ability of waterwalking. However, this ability was not included in the original version of TES V: Skyrim. But with the Dragonborn DLC, it has again made its appearance in Ahzidal's Boots of Waterwalking. Unfortunately, the ability is only accessible through these boots. But in this mod, I've added the effect for common use.

This mod adds two Spell Tomes that can teach the player how to cast the spell, and four scrolls that accomplish the same effect for one-time use. The tomes and scrolls are placed in various locations across Solstheim. They are also available for purchase from merchants.

I've provided two images to give hints at the locations for one scroll and one tome. The remaining items shouldn't be too hard to locate during your adventures in Dragonborn.

If you wanted this effect for enchanting, please refer to my mod; "Boots of Waterwalking". You can find this mod here; nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50008/

Note: This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC, as well as the update needed to play it. As obvious as this might seem, I felt it needed to be stated in the description.
author: Zach the Unholy
